PipelineDisplayName: The name of the pipeline that will be display in the import dialog.
bImportMaterials: If enabled, imports the material assets found in the sources.
SearchLocation: Specify where we should search for existing materials when importing.
AssetName: If set, and there is only one asset and one source, the imported asset will be given this name.
MaterialImport: Determines what kind of material assets should be created for the imported materials.
bIdentifyDuplicateMaterials: If set, reference materials along with respective material instances are created.
bCreateMaterialInstanceForParent: If set, additional material instances are created for reference/parent materials.
ParentMaterial: Optional material used as the parent when importing materials as instances. If no parent material is specified, one will be automatically selected during the import process.
